description: ASP.NET Core application metrics from OpenTelemetry

panels.description: The number of .NET assemblies that are currently loaded.
panels.title: Loaded assemblies

targets.expr:
topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$service",  http_route!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

panels.description: The number of thread pool threads that currently exist
panels.title: Thread pool threads

title: Asp.Net Core Service Overview
